commentary.text: Gautam Gambhir takes strike, Bisla at the other end
Binny to Gambhir,1 run,short of a length, Gambhir gets on his toes and dabs it to third man to get off the mark
Binny to Bisla,1 run,straightens from a length wide outside off, is punched to sweeper cover
Binny to Gambhir,1 run,this comes in to Gambhir from short of a length, he hops and runs it to third man again
Binny to Bisla,1 run,a leading edge loops over cover as Binny swings it away late, Bisla was playing the angle and trying to clip it to leg
Binny to Gambhir,3 runs,pulls a short ball, hasn't timed it but it is safely hit in the air in front of square
Binny to Bisla,no run,pitched up outside off, he leans forward to defend to extra cover
Richardson to Gambhir,no run,that is short of a length and zooms past Gambhir's attempted cut, away swing and bounce
Richardson to Gambhir, $$FOUR$$ ,Gambhir hits his first four of the season, this is a similar delivery, moving across and rising outside off, but he waits and places it between cover and point
Richardson to Gambhir,1 run,dabbed down to third man
Richardson to Bisla,no run,moves in from back of a length, is pushed off the back foot
Richardson to Bisla,no run,similar delivery, slightly tighter line, pushed back from the crease
Richardson to Bisla,no run,that zips past the outside edge, he was playing for inward movement after those last two balls but this does not come back in as much
Faulkner to Gambhir,2 wides,slants it down the leg side first up, and Samson's dive does not convert into a clean stop
Faulkner to Bisla,1 run,short and wide, and Bisla cuts, just past a diving backward point
Faulkner to Gambhir,no run,moving away wide from the left-hander, Gambhir tries a cut and misses
Faulkner to Gambhir,no run,works a good length ball off the pad to square leg
Tushar: "RR has missed the trick of pressurising the out of form Gambhir, should have given Richardson the first over. "
Faulkner to Gambhir, $$FOUR$$ ,Gambhir smacks a pull off the front foot just in front of square leg for a one-bounce four, that is well executed, the short ball was angled in and climbing on him
Faulkner to Gambhir,no run,guides a length ball to backward point
Faulkner to Gambhir,1 leg bye,hit on the pad with a length ball but that was going down leg
Richardson to Gambhir,no run,appeal for lbw, Gambhir hit on the pad on the forward press with a good length outswinger but that pitched outside leg
Richardson to Gambhir,1 run,moving away from the left-hander who runs it to third man
Richardson to Bisla,no run,sees Bisla charging out and digs it short, that comes back in alarmingly, and almost hits him, Bisla backs down just in time
Richardson to Bisla, $$OUT$$ ,bowls it on a good length wide outside off, it comes in a bit, Bisla attacks it, but can only thick edge to slip, who moves to his left to take a head-high catch
Richardson to Kallis,no run,pitched up and moving in towards off, Kallis defends from the crease
Richardson to Kallis,no run,comes outside the crease but is beaten outside off
Chandru: "Someone remind GG that he is out of form"
Iqbal Abdulla to Gambhir,1 run,comes out and whips it off the pad to deep square leg
Iqbal Abdulla to Kallis,1 run,Kallis moves out as well, gets a thick inside edge to short fine
Iqbal Abdulla to Gambhir,2 runs,makes room to a flat delivery and punches it past extra cover
Iqbal Abdulla to Gambhir, $$FOUR$$ ,this is full on the pad at 92 kph and Gambhir's sweep only needs to beat square leg, which it does
Iqbal Abdulla to Gambhir,1 run,knocks a full delivery on the stumps to long on
Iqbal Abdulla to Kallis,no run,straightish and pitched up around off, pushed back
Watson to Gambhir,no run,full and slanted across the left-hander, he mishits the drive to short extra cover
Watson to Gambhir,1 run,steps out and whips it off the pad, on a couple of bounces to deep midwicket

Watson to Kallis,1 no ball,Watson has struck big in his first over, there is a clear noise as Kallis tries to force this incoming length ball outside off, Samson hangs on, and the umpire raises his finger, but hold on, Watson has overstepped
Watson to Kallis,1 run,Kallis swings hard at the free hit, and it flies down to third man
Watson to Gambhir,no run,punches a good length delivery to point
Watson to Gambhir,no run,runs this pitched up delivery to slip on the bounce
Watson to Gambhir,no run,back of a length and straightening on the pad, Gambhir cannot work it away
Bhatia to Kallis,no run,good length ball guided to point
Bhatia to Kallis,2 runs,picks this from outside off and sweeps it over square leg, falls just short of Faulkner running across
Bhatia to Kallis,no run,tries to hit this slow length ball outside off, but is beaten by the lack of pace
Bhatia to Kallis,1 run,goes back and slaps it to sweeper cover
Bhatia to Gambhir,2 runs,Gambhir lofts this nicely over extra cover, long off runs around
Bhatia to Gambhir,no run,this is a slower one angled across him at 91 kph, Gambhir is beaten, keeper appeals for stumping, but Gambhir's foot was back in time
Watson to Kallis,no run,another sound as Watson moves this away wide outside off, Kallis plays at it and misses, the sound comes after ball passes bat though
Watson to Kallis,2 runs,leaves the crease but only gets an inside edge through square leg
Watson to Kallis,1 run,moves down the track and pushes to long off
Watson to Gambhir,no run,sharp, accurate bouncer at 136 kph, Gambhir tries to hook but is beaten
Watson to Gambhir,1 run,cuts this short and wide one hard but not far enough from sweeper cover
Watson to Kallis, $$FOUR$$ ,sends this one into the pad, and Kallis happily nudges it fine past the keeper
Tambe to Gambhir,1 run,moves back and cuts a flat delivery to sweeper cover
Tambe to Kallis,no run,drives a very full one to sweeper cover
Tambe to Kallis,1 run,flat and angled into the pad, worked fine
Tambe to Gambhir,1 run,straightens outside off, he guides it to sweeper cover
Tambe to Kallis, $$OUT$$ ,Smith runs in from long off and takes this skier, after Kallis top-edges a slog-sweep to this tossed up full delivery just outside off
Tambe to Gambhir,1 run,waits on this tossed up ball outside off and dabs it to short third man
Bhatia to Gambhir,1 run,opens up and forces this length delivery to long on
Bhatia to Pandey,1 run,108 kph good length ball turned to deep midwicket
Bhatia to Gambhir, $$FOUR$$ ,right in the gap between sweeper cover and long off, Gambhir steps forward to a fuller one cutting across him and lifts it over extra cover
Bhatia to Gambhir,1 run,close to off stump, he waits and dabs to third man
Bhatia to Pandey,no run,pushed to extra cover
vikas: "the main problem of KKR is dot balls."
Bhatia to Pandey,2 runs,a slow length ball at just 90 kph moving away outside off, Pandey works it through midwicket
Tambe to Gambhir,no run,was looking to paddle it initially, but saw it slanted across outside off, tried to dab it but missed
Tambe to Gambhir,no run,shout for lbw as Gambhir misses the paddle, that is an excellent shout, pitched in line and hit him in front of middle and leg
Tambe to Gambhir,1 run,down the track and whips it to deep midwicket
Tambe to Pandey,1 wide,pushed down the leg side at 87 kph, Pandey misses as he tries to whip it fine
Tambe to Pandey,1 run,full delivery hit down to long on
Tambe to Gambhir,2 runs,turns a flighted ball with the spin through midwicket and comes back for the second
Tambe to Gambhir,1 run,works a full one down to long on
Bhatia to Gambhir,1 run,moves across, Bhatia bowls it around off at 95 kph, Gambhir adjusts to dab it behind point
Bhatia to Pandey,1 run,tries to whack it over midwicket but there is no pace to lift it, he mistimes it down to long on
Bhatia to Gambhir,2 runs,attacks this over pitched ball and drills it wide of long on
Bhatia to Gambhir,1 run,this was down the leg side, and Gambhir went across to try and sweep it past short fine leg, but found the man
Bhatia to Pandey,2 runs,Tambe's done well, this was swung hard and flat and was bouncing just in front of him, he went back a little at deep square leg, and stopped it from going past
Bhatia to Pandey,1 run,angled in, helped along to short fine leg, Gambhir rushes across for the single and makes it in time
Tambe to Pandey,1 run,drives but cannot time it, gets it past extra cover though
Tambe to Gambhir,no run,makes some room and cuts, but finds point, Pandey was a long way out and had to rush  back
Tambe to Gambhir,1 leg bye,another shout for lbw as Gambhir misses another paddle against Tambe, this one pitched just outside leg
Tambe to Pandey, $$SIX$$ ,Pandey gets one away, he charges out, takes it on the full and hammers it over deep midwicket
Tambe to Pandey, $$FOUR$$ ,flatter and quicker, Pandey takes it from outside off and pulls it to the deep midwicket rope
Tambe to Pandey, $$OUT$$ ,plumb, Tambe comes back by slipping in the quicker one, Pandey is caught clueless and he is right in front
Bhatia to Gambhir,1 run,length ball turned to deep midwicket
Bhatia to Yadav,1 wide,floats this well down the leg side
Bhatia to Yadav,no run,drives a length delivery to extra cover
Bhatia to Yadav,1 run,still slower length ball slapped past extra cover
Bhatia to Gambhir, $$OUT$$ ,Bhatia's struck, Gambhir's swept a cutter off his pads high and straight to deep square leg
Bhatia to Shakib Al Hasan,2 runs,guides a length ball through point and wide enough of the sweeper to take two
Bhatia to Shakib Al Hasan,2 runs,charges out and has a heave, on a couple of bounces to long on as he moves to his left, almost overran it
Iqbal Abdulla to Yadav,2 runs,flat length ball forced wide of deep midwicket for two more
Iqbal Abdulla to Yadav, $$FOUR$$ ,moves inside the line and lofts cleanly over extra cover
Iqbal Abdulla to Yadav,1 run,flatter one pushed down to long off
Iqbal Abdulla to Shakib Al Hasan,no run,appeal for leg before turned down as he misses a sweep, pitched just outside leg
Iqbal Abdulla to Shakib Al Hasan,1 run,steps out, takes it on the full and works it to deep midwicket
Iqbal Abdulla to Yadav,1 bye
Tambe to Yadav,2 runs,swept from outside off behind square leg
Tambe to Yadav,no run,swept to short fine leg
Tambe to Yadav, $$FOUR$$ ,this is angled down the pads, Yadav bends on his knee and sweeps it high over short fine leg
Tambe to Yadav,1 run,another sweep, picks it from outside off, hits it to deep backward square
Tambe to Shakib Al Hasan,1 run,Shakib slog-sweeps off his pad to deep square leg now
Tambe to Yadav,2 runs,steps out and forces it to deep midwicket, there is a direct hit at the striker's end and they take one more for the ricochet
Time out
Watson is back
Watson to Shakib Al Hasan,1 run,he's taken this low full toss from outside off, and in trying to lift it to fine leg, has smacked it straight into his helmet
Watson to Yadav,1 no ball,goes full and wide, batsman misses, but umpire Dar stretches his left hand, because Watson has bowled a massive no ball
Watson to Yadav,1 run,walks outside off, Watson foes full in that region, he squeezes it square
Watson to Shakib Al Hasan,1 run,Shakib comes out, Watson goes full across him, he stabs it to the off side
Watson to Yadav, $$SIX$$ ,Yadav's doing it for KKR, he's stretched forward and across, taken this full delivery from outside off, and swept it over deep square leg
Watson to Yadav, $$FOUR$$ ,that'll help too, Watson is full and wide again, Yadav swings, the thick edge flies past the keeper
Watson to Yadav,1 run,a low full toss driven to long off
Richardson to Yadav,1 run,full and wide one driven to sweeper cover
Amit: "Well..Surya Yadav is no doubt the most impressive batsman for KKR for this season so far.. !!"
Richardson to Shakib Al Hasan, $$FOUR$$ ,fine leg is up, Shakib pulls a shortish ball, and it runs past the fielder's dive, deep square chases and dives too, in vain
Richardson to Shakib Al Hasan, $$FOUR$$ ,another one, he goes deep in the crease to a full delivery and whips it through midwicket, timed well enough to beat long on
over the stumps
Richardson to Shakib Al Hasan,no run,swings at a pitched up delivery angled in but cannot get it away
Richardson to Shakib Al Hasan,1 run,attacks a similar delivery and hits it to deep midwicket this time
Richardson to Yadav,1 run,tries to go square on the leg side from outside off, edges it into the helmet and it pops up close by
Faulkner to Yadav, $$OUT$$ ,Faulkner's kept this alive, Yadav's skied this full and wide one slanted across him, and Smith has run in from long off and taken it in front of his head
Faulkner to Shakib Al Hasan,2 runs,another skier, this was down the leg side, and Shakib swung hard at it, but this time, it falls short of deep square leg running to his left
Faulkner to Shakib Al Hasan,1 wide,backs away to the leg side, Faulkner tries to follow him but sends it further down instead
Faulkner to Shakib Al Hasan,1 run,Faulkner goes full into leg stump at 140 kph, Shakib gets a thick inside edge to fine leg
Faulkner to Uthappa, $$OUT$$ ,Uthappa's gone too far across, Faulkner bowls the slower one from back of the hand, good length on middle and leg, Uthappa misses, and Faulkner hits
Faulkner to Vinay Kumar, $$OUT$$ ,Faulkner keeps hitting the stumps, another slower one, full on off stump this time, Vinay swings and misses
Faulkner to Chawla,no run,Faulkner just misses the hat trick, slow delivery bounces from a length, past Chawla's swipe, and goes over the stumps
Richardson to Shakib Al Hasan, $$FOUR$$ ,Shakib gets four first ball, he arches back to a high full toss and smears it through the covers, there is no sweeper

Richardson to Shakib Al Hasan,1 run,  $$OUT$$ ,a run-out now, Shakib backs away and forces a full delivery to long on, Chawla wants the second, Shakib does not and raises his hand, but Chawla is too far out already and is run out by miles as Smith fires it to the keeper
Richardson to Narine,1 wide,he sends it way down the leg side from wide of the crease
Richardson to Narine,1 run,full on off, Narine tries to drive it through the covers, cannot get the mistimed stroke past the infield
Richardson to Shakib Al Hasan,no run,not called a wide, Shakib went towards off to try and scoop it to fine leg, missed as it was slanted past leg stump
Richardson to Shakib Al Hasan,2 runs,Shakib comes out and lofts wide of long off for a couple

Richardson to Shakib Al Hasan,2 runs,scores are tied, Shakib drags this full delivery down the ground, long off rushes in but his throw is not strong enough to prevent the second, and we go into a Super Over
So KKR have almost given it away once again. They were 137 for 4 needing 16 from 12. What an over that was from Faulkner
Adhithya S R: "The only thing missing from this leg in UAE was a super over. And guess what they managed to give us that too!!!"

name: Kolkata Knight Riders v Rajasthan Royals
